EDMA_hwAttrs_t_ Struct Reference

#include <drivers/edma/include/edma_xwr1xxx.h>

Detailed Description

brief EDMA Hardware attributes.

Field Documentation

uint32_t EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::CCbaseAddress

Channel Controller (CC) base address

uint16_t EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::errorInterruptNum

Channel Controller (CC) Error interrupt number. If not mapped, set to EDMA_INTERRUPT_NOT_CONNECTED_ID

bool EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::isChannelMapExist

Channel Mapping feature existence - true if exists, false if does not exist. See DCHMAP in EDMA UG. Note this existence can also be derived by reading the chip configuration register CCCFG.

uint8_t EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::numEventQueues

brief Number of event queues. Same as number of transfer controllers.

uint16_t EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::numParamSets

brief Number of PaRAM sets

uint32_t EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::TCbaseAddress[EDMA_MAX_NUM_TC]

Transfer Controllers (TC) base addresses.

uint16_t EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::transferCompletionInterruptNum

brief Transfer completion interrupt number. If not mapped, set to EDMA_INTERRUPT_NOT_CONNECTED_ID

uint16_t EDMA_hwAttrs_t_::transferControllerErrorInterruptNum[EDMA_MAX_NUM_TC]

Transfer controller error interrupt numbers. If not mapped, set to EDMA_INTERRUPT_NOT_CONNECTED_ID
